subject: Re: Fourth part of Watsuki's interview

I do feel the same way... I wish we could have had more RK Saitou 
goodness to read. I also hope that Watsuki will go back to writing 
historical manga. Maybe something specifically about the Shisengumi 
this time? (crossing fingers)


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> Mary-Ann,
> 
> Can't thank you enough for translating the Hokkaido Arc 
interview... 
> I'm quite devastated that it didn't push through... It would've 
been 
> so cool to see Shinpachi and Soujirou as main characters, but most 
of 
> all I'll still have more RK Saitou goodness to read... Remember 
Aoshi 
> said Saitou was in Hokkaido... *cries* I wonder how Watsuki 
would've 
> portrayed Shinpachi, his relationship with Saitou and all that 
> goodness. 
> 
> I can't believe he chose to deviate from writing historical 
manga... 
> I mean yeah it's been discussed before and many times that the his 
> following mangas were not "par" with RK. Didn't he for once think 
> that "I will be the King of Historical Manga". Why oh why did he 
> stopped...
> 
> ~wounds
>
